DESCRIPTION: If you are in a #yStance, trigger its Skill Bonus.
Gain the next card provided by your Stance and advance it one stage.
When this card is generated via Combo, exit your Stance.
Next turn, gain Riposte, an Attack which costs 1 and deals damage equal to the amount of damage you blocked this turn.
#yStance. Provides these effects, in order, when #yCombo is triggered: NL Gain 4 Block. NL Gain 7 Block and 1 Counter. NL Gain 10 Block and draw 2 more cards next turn.
#yStance. Provides these effects, in order, when #yCombo is triggered: NL Gain 3 Vigor. NL Deal 4 damage to ALL enemies twice. NL Deal 8 damage twice.
#yStance. Provides these effects, in order, when #yCombo is triggered: NL Gain [E]. NL Draw 2 cards. NL Deal 8 damage. Apply 2 Weak and 2 Vulnerable.
#yStance. Provides these effects, in order, when #yCombo is triggered: NL Gain 1 Max HP. NL Gain 10 Gold. NL Upgrade the next card you play permanently.
Lose HP. Restore #yFatigued HP at the end of combat. You won't die from #yFatigue .
